title: HealthNarrate – AI Medical Report Summarizer
goal: Summarize long reports into easy, structured summaries with key terms explained.
why_it_matters: Patients struggle to interpret dense lab and imaging reports.
users: Patients, health tech startups, telemedicine apps.
data: Public pathology reports (MIMIC-III subset or synthetic data).
ai: Entity extraction for medical terms (MedNER / scispaCy).
workflow: Summarize each section into 1–2 simple lines.
Add definitions for jargon using a glossary.
outcome: Advanced NLP use with social impact; strong ethical focus.
